thread.title: Raiders’ Amerson and Chargers’ Allen are longtime friends
thread.title_full: Raiders’ Amerson and Chargers’ Allen are longtime friends - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Vic Tafur
title: Raiders’ Amerson and Chargers’ Allen are longtime friends
text:
Photo: Jonathan Daniel, Getty Images David Amerson, right, had only two tackles in two games for Washington, but surpassed that total in his first game with the Raiders and in his last two games — both starts — has 12, including nine solos. David Amerson, right, had only two tackles in two games for...
The first time David Amerson was matched against Keenan Allen came in Greensboro, N.C, in 2009. They were two of the top high school safety prospects in the nation, but Allen also was a gifted receiver (spoiler alert: He currently leads the NFL with 53 receptions) and running back.
